item.title: DOGE job cuts push U.S. layoffs to postpandemic high. Is the labor market crumbling?

item.title: Supermarket giant Kroger says egg prices jumped 70% — but it’ll handle inflation from tariffs better than others
item.description: Kroger’s stock rose Thursday after the supermarket giant said it’s better suited than others to handle the impact of trade tariffs, since many of its ...

item.title: Millennials are getting richer faster than previous generations. Here’s how they’re doing it.
item.description: Millennials have seen their wealth outpace that of older generations over the past five years.

item.title: Macy’s stock falls as it cuts guidance in the face of ‘external uncertainties’
item.description: The retailer said it’s taking a “prudent” approach to its outlook as it warns of a profit shortfall.

item.title: With Trump’s tariffs paused, ‘Big Three’ automakers may race to build inventories
item.description: Automakers got a reprieve from Trump’s tariffs, and may use this time to build up inventories.
